snippet: The showdown between Seattle and San Francisco backs found little traction until Marshawn Lynch ripped off a 40-yard touchdown in the third quarter.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch finishes with 109 yards on 22 carries, including a 40-yard touchdown run, in team's victory over San Francisco 49ers in NFC championship game.
lead_paragraph: The showdown between Seattle and San Francisco backs found little traction until Marshawn Lynch ripped off a 40-yard touchdown in the third quarter.

headline.main: Lynch’s Third-Quarter Blast Breaks Pacific Northwest Logjam
headline.print_headline: Lynch’s Third-Quarter Blast Breaks Pacific Northwest Logjam
